mineral.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a substance that is formed naturally in the earth, such as coal, salt, stone, or gold. Minerals can be dug out of the ground and used
mineral.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The area is very rich in minerals.
a country with few mineral resources
mineral.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a natural substance such as iron that is present in some foods and is important for good health
mineral.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Fish is a rich source of vitamins and minerals.
